title: Approach to infant education
creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation, Don Anderson and Ron Saunders
brief_description: Follows a day’s activities in a junior primary classroom and looks at how one teacher uses space and time in her teaching methods. The film also looks at the “vertical grouping” method of teaching.
